message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a fantastic opportunity for both of us to make a great deal. I'm willing to offer you the product for $12,000. This is a competitive price considering its worth to you is $8,000. I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its worth to me is $8,000.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9,000. Considering the product's value to me is $10,000, I'm willing to meet you halfway.
